Desc.entry: Qualified counsellors/psychotherapists each with over 15 years experience working safely and sensitively with women. All practitioners are qualified in the 'Integrative Technique' , a combination of Pellin Contribution Training (a Cognitive self-help approach) and Gestalt psychotherapy. Therapists are BACP members, follow the BACP code of ethics and practice, and are supervised. Charges on a sliding scale. Concessionary rates available. Service available at various venues in South Yorkshire. Weekend, weekday and evening appointments available.
